text: Akho, ki kihara tuhanu dharati ate akasam vica rozi dida hai jam kauna hai jihara kanam ate akham ute kabu rakhada hai ate kauna nirajivam vicom jiva ate jivam vicom nirajiva nu kadhada hai ate kauna sare mamali'am da prabadha karada hai. Uha kahinage ki alaha. Kahom, ki phira tusim darade ki'um nahim
